scripts.check: tsc && tsc -p scripts && tsc -p public_api --noEmit && eslint .
scripts.fmt-check: npm run fmt && npm run check
scripts.build-public-api: tsc -p public_api --noEmit false --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly && esbuild public_api/src/index.ts --outfile=public_api/dist/index.js --bundle --format=esm --external:@minecraft/common --external:@minecraft/debug-utilities --external:@minecraft/server --external:@minecraft/server-* && terser public_api/dist/index.js --module -cmo public_api/dist/index.js
